amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for the Administrator of the EPA to accept, consider, or rely on third-party intentional dosing human studies for pesticides or to conduct intentional dosing human studies for pesticides.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill by the Administrator of EPA to (1) accept, consider, or rely on third-party intentional dosing human studies for pesticides; or (2) to conduct intentional dosing human studies for pesticides.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Solis amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
